sentences: Gaasi nägemine on huvitav teaduslik fenomen.
Selleks et mõista gaasi spektreid, peame tundma füüsikat.
Aatomiline gaasi analüüs annab meile olulisi andmeid.
context: The word 'gaasi' is the genitive singular form of the Estonian noun 'gaas', which means 'gas'. In the context provided, it appears in phrases like 'aatomi|spekter füüs atomaarse gaasi v. auru spekter Vesiniku aatomispekter', which relates to atomic spectra and physics. This suggests specific usage in scientific contexts referring to gaseous substances or vapor spectra.
